channel.title: Error: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .*/~chiptune/blog/.+ -i .*/~chiptune/blog/feed.rss --date-from-xpath //@datetime --xpath-date-fmt %Y-%m-%dT00:00:00+00:00 --follow --with-body --title ~chiptune posts on ctrl-c.club --title-regex .+ - (.*) --body-csss article https://ctrl-c.club/~chiptune/blog/ -o ./feeds/chiptune.xml

item.title: newslinkrss error: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str
item.description:
An error occurred when generating this feed.

Command line: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .*/~chiptune/blog/.+ -i .*/~chiptune/blog/feed.rss --date-from-xpath //@datetime --xpath-date-fmt %Y-%m-%dT00:00:00+00:00 --follow --with-body --title ~chiptune posts on ctrl-c.club --title-regex .+ - (.*) --body-csss article https://ctrl-c.club/~chiptune/blog/ -o ./feeds/chiptune.xml

Exception: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str

Stack trace: 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 1666, in main
    make_feed(args)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 854, in make_feed
    req = get_start_page(args, session, base_attrs, link_grabber, curr_url)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 748, in get_start_page
    base_attrs.feed(page_content)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.9.16/x64/lib/python3.9/html/parser.py", line 109, in feed
    self.rawdata = self.rawdata + data
TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str
